channel.title: How to change color of an existing item?
channel.description:
I have changed name on some items like faithful shield. I turned that to God shield and putted som more prayer bonus into it. But now I want edited items like that to turn into a green color, so when you right click it it stays: Wield [COLOR="Lime"]God Shield[/COLOR] Use [COLOR="Lime"]God Shield[/COLOR] Drop [COLOR="Lime"]God Shield[/COLOR] Examine [COLOR="Lime"]God Shield[/COLOR] Cancel
case 18747: itemDef.name = "God Shield"; itemDef.description = "A shield made by gods"; break;
Please post what I should add into this!

item.title: How to change color of an existing item?
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

For 317 use @red@ or @blue@ depending on
Though I think it matter on the client also.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change color of an existing item?

item.title: How to change color of an existing item?
item.dc:creator: @cryses cryses
item.description:
@cryses wrote:

I have changed name on some items like faithful shield. I turned that to God shield and putted som more prayer bonus into it. But now I want edited items like that to turn into a green color, so when you right click it it stays:

Wield [COLOR=“Lime”]God Shield[/COLOR]
Use [COLOR=“Lime”]God Shield[/COLOR]
Drop [COLOR=“Lime”]God Shield[/COLOR]
Examine [COLOR=“Lime”]God Shield[/COLOR]
Cancel

case 18747: itemDef.name = "God Shield"; itemDef.description = "A shield made by gods"; break;
Please post what I should add into this!

Read full topic
item.source: How to change color of an existing item?
